import React,{ useState } from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { MDBBtn, MDBContainer, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBInput, MDBIcon, MDBCheckbox, } from "mdb-react-ui-kit"; function App() { const [details,setDetails]=useState({ fname: "", email: "", number:"" }); const [go,setGo]=useState(false); function handle(data){ const {id,value}=data.target setDetails((prev) => { return { ...prev, [id]: value, }; }); let s=details[1]; let num=details[1].size(); if(num<=10){setGo(false);} if(details[0].size>0 && details[2].size()==10 && s.substr(num-10)=="@gmail.com"){ setGo(true); } } return (

Contact details

{go && ( Submit )} ); } export default App;
